title: Wellness Center Usa
overview: Wellness Center USA is a newly formed business created to address important healthcare and wellness needs; through break-through solutions, centered on the “well-being of the body and mind”. Such solutions include advanced nutritional products, alternative and complimentary medicine (ACM), and behavioral health services.

We looked outside the company to Evan Kosowski, one of the many designers we have built a relationship with over the years. He hit a homerun with the logo redesign and the new and fresh feel that an innovative company deserves.
